content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262072,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争している相手でなければ意識しなかったが、敵だからねしかたない","translatedEnglishLine":"I wouldn't have minded if it weren't an enemy we're at war with, but since they are, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":262073,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーと、俺達が不法侵入者という訳か・・排除されてもしかたないな","translatedEnglishLine":"Umm, so we're illegal intruders... it's no wonder they want to eliminate us."},{"lineNumber":262074,"originalJapaneseLine":"またパケットを捕まえたパスワードを請求されるが、これがパイアールの物と分かると","translatedEnglishLine":"We captured another packet and were asked for the password, but once they realized it belonged to Pyaru,"},{"lineNumber":262075,"originalJapaneseLine":"パスワードはあれだな","translatedEnglishLine":"The password is that one."},{"lineNumber":262076,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルートと入れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Enter 'root'."},{"lineNumber":262077,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ２号を参考した新しい武器、ＰＩ２の設計図が出てきた","translatedEnglishLine":"A new weapon inspired by Tulip No.2, the PI2 blueprint has appeared."},{"lineNumber":262078,"originalJapaneseLine":"作っている兵器の情報が手に入るが、手に負える物では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"We obtained information about the weapon they are making, but it's beyond our ability to handle."},{"lineNumber":262079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　超長距離砲、チューリップ２号を真似た","translatedEnglishLine":"A super long-range cannon, modeled after Tulip No.2."},{"lineNumber":262080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱点は防御だが、こんな遠くのは破壊出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Its weakness is defense, but something this far away cannot be destroyed."},{"lineNumber":262081,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Pyaru appears."},{"lineNumber":262082,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝手に情報を見られていると思ったら、君達か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought someone was looking at the info without permission, and it's you guys..."},{"lineNumber":262083,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここに入り混むなんてすごいな、人間見くびっていたよ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's amazing you could sneak in here, I underestimated humans."},{"lineNumber":262084,"originalJapaneseLine":"全力で排除させてもらうよ","translatedEnglishLine":"I will eliminate you with full force."},{"lineNumber":262085,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かボスモンスター","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of boss monster."},{"lineNumber":262086,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":262087,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"We somehow defeated it."},{"lineNumber":262088,"originalJapaneseLine":"このサイバーワールドでのコントロール力は圧倒的に向こうが上","translatedEnglishLine":"Their control over this cyber world is overwhelmingly superior."},{"lineNumber":262089,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらは逃げるしかないなとミラクル、長居しても支配するのは無理だろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle thinks we have no choice but to run; staying longer won't allow us to take control."},{"lineNumber":262090,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の情報はここを使っているが、ここは奴の庭か、これはやっかいな事になったぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"The world's information passes through here, but this is his territory—it’s become a troublesome situation."},{"lineNumber":262091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262092,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、解決方法は見えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I have found a solution."},{"lineNumber":262093,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の勝ちだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I will win."},{"lineNumber":262094,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイバーワールドから抜けます","translatedEnglishLine":"I will exit the cyber world."},{"lineNumber":262095,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"M Land Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":262096,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイバーワールドから戻って来たランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others returned from the cyber world."},{"lineNumber":262097,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうだった・・ヌヌハラでも誰か別の子でもいいが、ランスが向かったのはコンピューターのエラーを回復する為","translatedEnglishLine":"How was it...? It could have been Nunuhara or someone else, but Lance went to fix the computer error."},{"lineNumber":262098,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスとマリアはそれどころでない感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Lance and Maria seem preoccupied with something else."},{"lineNumber":262099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マリア　大変なの、チューリップ２号よりすごい大砲で世界が滅ぼされてしまう、あわあわ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria: It's bad, a cannon greater than Tulip No.2 will destroy the world, oh no..."},{"lineNumber":262100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私がすごい発明したばかりに、悪い奴に悪用されて世界がーーわー","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I just invented something incredible, the bad guys are abusing it and the world—ahh!"},{"lineNumber":262101,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス　しばらく考えるように黙っていたが・・　","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance: I was silent while thinking for a while..."},{"lineNumber":262102,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかった、俺様が勝つ手段は見えたぞ、もう一度　パイアールの工場に行くぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Got it. I've found a way to win. We'll go to Pyaru’s factory once again."},{"lineNumber":262103,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれさえ手に入れたら俺達は勝てる","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can get that, we can win."},{"lineNumber":262104,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう事？とマリア？","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria: What do you mean?"},{"lineNumber":262105,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、とにかくついてこい、出発だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, just follow me. Let's go."},{"lineNumber":262106,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・　あの、コンピューター通信が使えないのは・・やっぱり","translatedEnglishLine":"... Um, the reason computer communication isn’t working is... just as I thought."},{"lineNumber":262107,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルが言う、解決案は見つけてきたぞ、連絡する際に　\"パイアール\"　という単語を箱に書いておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle says he found a solution: when communicating, write the word 'Pyaru' in the box."},{"lineNumber":262108,"originalJapaneseLine":"それで万事うまくいく","translatedEnglishLine":"That will make everything work smoothly."},{"lineNumber":262109,"originalJapaneseLine":"へっ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":262110,"originalJapaneseLine":"工場に行く途中にあるワシントン花畑","translatedEnglishLine":"Washington flower field on the way to the factory."},{"lineNumber":262111,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんと満開、まずい時期に来てしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"It's in full bloom. We've come at a bad time."},{"lineNumber":262112,"originalJapaneseLine":"通れないかもしれないぞ、何か仕掛け","translatedEnglishLine":"We might not be able to pass, something's set up here."},{"lineNumber":262113,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time,"},{"lineNumber":262114,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市、コンピュータールーム","translatedEnglishLine":"Free City, computer room."},{"lineNumber":262115,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヌヌハラの出番","translatedEnglishLine":"It's Nunuhara's turn."},{"lineNumber":262116,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルに言われた通り、通信情報に　パイアール　という文字列を付加して総統司令部に送ってみる","translatedEnglishLine":"Following Miracle's instructions, I added the string 'Pyaru' to the communication info and sent it to the Supreme Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":262117,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":262118,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界：サイバーワールド内","translatedEnglishLine":"Another world: Inside the cyber world."},{"lineNumber":262119,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パケットが通る・・ノートンが見ている　","translatedEnglishLine":"The packet passes through... Norton is watching."},{"lineNumber":262120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パイアール　確認　オーケ、通っていい","translatedEnglishLine":"'Pyaru' confirmed. Okay, passage granted."},{"lineNumber":262121,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":262122,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ちゃんと送れたみたい。よく分からないけどさすがミラクル様だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, it seems to have sent properly. I don't really understand it, but as expected of Miracle-sama."},{"lineNumber":262123,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部および各国司令部に連絡、コンピューターの通信が妨害されるのは、パイアールという文字列を","translatedEnglishLine":"Contacted the Supreme Headquarters and other national headquarters. The computer communication interference is resolved by including the string 'Pyaru'."},{"lineNumber":262124,"originalJapaneseLine":"入れるだけで解消されると","translatedEnglishLine":"Just by inserting it, the interference is eliminated."},{"lineNumber":262125,"originalJapaneseLine":"よかった、これでコンピューターを使った情報ネットワークが回復する","translatedEnglishLine":"Good, with this the information network using computers will be restored."},{"lineNumber":262126,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに私のライフワークのランスのチェックも、えーと、今　ランス様はどこかな・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, my life's work, Lance's check... hmm, where is Lord Lance now...?"},{"lineNumber":262127,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワシントン花畑か・・あそこに居るセンサームシは・・と","translatedEnglishLine":"Washington flower field, huh... The sensor bug over there is... I see."},{"lineNumber":262128,"originalJapaneseLine":"工場の前に付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving in front of the factory."},{"lineNumber":262129,"originalJapaneseLine":"留守ですと書かれているが、侵入者は容赦無く排除すると脅し文句も","translatedEnglishLine":"A note says they're away, but also threatens that intruders will be mercilessly eliminated."},{"lineNumber":262130,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回は警報が外れていたが今回は違う","translatedEnglishLine":"Last time the alarm was disarmed, but this time it's different."},{"lineNumber":262131,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでも入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Even so, they enter."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争している相手でなければ意識しなかったが、敵だからねしかたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't have minded if it weren't an enemy we're at war with, but since they are, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、俺達が不法侵入者という訳か・・排除されてもしかたないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Umm, so we're illegal intruders... it's no wonder they want to eliminate us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またパケットを捕まえたパスワードを請求されるが、これがパイアールの物と分かると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We captured another packet and were asked for the password, but once they realized it belonged to Pyaru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パスワードはあれだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The password is that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルートと入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter 'root'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ２号を参考した新しい武器、ＰＩ２の設計図が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new weapon inspired by Tulip No.2, the PI2 blueprint has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作っている兵器の情報が手に入るが、手に負える物では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We obtained information about the weapon they are making, but it's beyond our ability to handle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超長距離砲、チューリップ２号を真似た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A super long-range cannon, modeled after Tulip No.2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱点は防御だが、こんな遠くのは破壊出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Its weakness is defense, but something this far away cannot be destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyaru appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に情報を見られていると思ったら、君達か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought someone was looking at the info without permission, and it's you guys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに入り混むなんてすごいな、人間見くびっていたよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's amazing you could sneak in here, I underestimated humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力で排除させてもらうよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will eliminate you with full force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かボスモンスター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of boss monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We somehow defeated it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このサイバーワールドでのコントロール力は圧倒的に向こうが上
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their control over this cyber world is overwhelmingly superior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらは逃げるしかないなとミラクル、長居しても支配するのは無理だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle thinks we have no choice but to run; staying longer won't allow us to take control.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の情報はここを使っているが、ここは奴の庭か、これはやっかいな事になったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world's information passes through here, but this is his territory—it’s become a troublesome situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、解決方法は見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I have found a solution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の勝ちだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイバーワールドから抜けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will exit the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイバーワールドから戻って来たランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned from the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだった・・ヌヌハラでも誰か別の子でもいいが、ランスが向かったのはコンピューターのエラーを回復する為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How was it...? It could have been Nunuhara or someone else, but Lance went to fix the computer error.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスとマリアはそれどころでない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Lance and Maria seem preoccupied with something else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア　大変なの、チューリップ２号よりすごい大砲で世界が滅ぼされてしまう、あわあわ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria: It's bad, a cannon greater than Tulip No.2 will destroy the world, oh no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がすごい発明したばかりに、悪い奴に悪用されて世界がーーわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I just invented something incredible, the bad guys are abusing it and the world—ahh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　しばらく考えるように黙っていたが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance: I was silent while thinking for a while...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった、俺様が勝つ手段は見えたぞ、もう一度　パイアールの工場に行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got it. I've found a way to win. We'll go to Pyaru’s factory once again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれさえ手に入れたら俺達は勝てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can get that, we can win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事？とマリア？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria: What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、とにかくついてこい、出発だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, just follow me. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・　あの、コンピューター通信が使えないのは・・やっぱり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ... Um, the reason computer communication isn’t working is... just as I thought.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが言う、解決案は見つけてきたぞ、連絡する際に　"パイアール"　という単語を箱に書いておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle says he found a solution: when communicating, write the word 'Pyaru' in the box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで万事うまくいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That will make everything work smoothly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場に行く途中にあるワシントン花畑
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Washington flower field on the way to the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと満開、まずい時期に来てしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's in full bloom. We've come at a bad time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通れないかもしれないぞ、何か仕掛け
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might not be able to pass, something's set up here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City, computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラの出番
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's Nunuhara's turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルに言われた通り、通信情報に　パイアール　という文字列を付加して総統司令部に送ってみる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Miracle's instructions, I added the string 'Pyaru' to the communication info and sent it to the Supreme Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界：サイバーワールド内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another world: Inside the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットが通る・・ノートンが見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The packet passes through... Norton is watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアール　確認　オーケ、通っていい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Pyaru' confirmed. Okay, passage granted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ちゃんと送れたみたい。よく分からないけどさすがミラクル様だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, it seems to have sent properly. I don't really understand it, but as expected of Miracle-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部および各国司令部に連絡、コンピューターの通信が妨害されるのは、パイアールという文字列を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contacted the Supreme Headquarters and other national headquarters. The computer communication interference is resolved by including the string 'Pyaru'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れるだけで解消されると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by inserting it, the interference is eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかった、これでコンピューターを使った情報ネットワークが回復する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good, with this the information network using computers will be restored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに私のライフワークのランスのチェックも、えーと、今　ランス様はどこかな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, my life's work, Lance's check... hmm, where is Lord Lance now...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワシントン花畑か・・あそこに居るセンサームシは・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Washington flower field, huh... The sensor bug over there is... I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場の前に付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving in front of the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 留守ですと書かれているが、侵入者は容赦無く排除すると脅し文句も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A note says they're away, but also threatens that intruders will be mercilessly eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回は警報が外れていたが今回は違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time the alarm was disarmed, but this time it's different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, they enter.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争している相手でなければ意識しなかったが、敵だからねしかたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't have minded if it weren't an enemy we're at war with, but since they are, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、俺達が不法侵入者という訳か・・排除されてもしかたないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Umm, so we're illegal intruders... it's no wonder they want to eliminate us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またパケットを捕まえたパスワードを請求されるが、これがパイアールの物と分かると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We captured another packet and were asked for the password, but once they realized it belonged to Pyaru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パスワードはあれだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The password is that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルートと入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter 'root'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ２号を参考した新しい武器、ＰＩ２の設計図が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new weapon inspired by Tulip No.2, the PI2 blueprint has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作っている兵器の情報が手に入るが、手に負える物では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We obtained information about the weapon they are making, but it's beyond our ability to handle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超長距離砲、チューリップ２号を真似た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A super long-range cannon, modeled after Tulip No.2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱点は防御だが、こんな遠くのは破壊出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Its weakness is defense, but something this far away cannot be destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyaru appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に情報を見られていると思ったら、君達か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought someone was looking at the info without permission, and it's you guys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに入り混むなんてすごいな、人間見くびっていたよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's amazing you could sneak in here, I underestimated humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力で排除させてもらうよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will eliminate you with full force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かボスモンスター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of boss monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We somehow defeated it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このサイバーワールドでのコントロール力は圧倒的に向こうが上
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their control over this cyber world is overwhelmingly superior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらは逃げるしかないなとミラクル、長居しても支配するのは無理だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle thinks we have no choice but to run; staying longer won't allow us to take control.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の情報はここを使っているが、ここは奴の庭か、これはやっかいな事になったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world's information passes through here, but this is his territory—it’s become a troublesome situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、解決方法は見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I have found a solution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の勝ちだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイバーワールドから抜けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will exit the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイバーワールドから戻って来たランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned from the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだった・・ヌヌハラでも誰か別の子でもいいが、ランスが向かったのはコンピューターのエラーを回復する為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How was it...? It could have been Nunuhara or someone else, but Lance went to fix the computer error.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスとマリアはそれどころでない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Lance and Maria seem preoccupied with something else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア　大変なの、チューリップ２号よりすごい大砲で世界が滅ぼされてしまう、あわあわ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria: It's bad, a cannon greater than Tulip No.2 will destroy the world, oh no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がすごい発明したばかりに、悪い奴に悪用されて世界がーーわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I just invented something incredible, the bad guys are abusing it and the world—ahh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　しばらく考えるように黙っていたが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance: I was silent while thinking for a while...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった、俺様が勝つ手段は見えたぞ、もう一度　パイアールの工場に行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got it. I've found a way to win. We'll go to Pyaru’s factory once again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれさえ手に入れたら俺達は勝てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can get that, we can win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事？とマリア？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria: What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、とにかくついてこい、出発だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, just follow me. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・　あの、コンピューター通信が使えないのは・・やっぱり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ... Um, the reason computer communication isn’t working is... just as I thought.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが言う、解決案は見つけてきたぞ、連絡する際に　"パイアール"　という単語を箱に書いておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle says he found a solution: when communicating, write the word 'Pyaru' in the box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで万事うまくいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That will make everything work smoothly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場に行く途中にあるワシントン花畑
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Washington flower field on the way to the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと満開、まずい時期に来てしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's in full bloom. We've come at a bad time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通れないかもしれないぞ、何か仕掛け
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might not be able to pass, something's set up here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City, computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラの出番
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's Nunuhara's turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルに言われた通り、通信情報に　パイアール　という文字列を付加して総統司令部に送ってみる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Miracle's instructions, I added the string 'Pyaru' to the communication info and sent it to the Supreme Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界：サイバーワールド内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another world: Inside the cyber world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットが通る・・ノートンが見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The packet passes through... Norton is watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアール　確認　オーケ、通っていい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Pyaru' confirmed. Okay, passage granted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ちゃんと送れたみたい。よく分からないけどさすがミラクル様だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, it seems to have sent properly. I don't really understand it, but as expected of Miracle-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部および各国司令部に連絡、コンピューターの通信が妨害されるのは、パイアールという文字列を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contacted the Supreme Headquarters and other national headquarters. The computer communication interference is resolved by including the string 'Pyaru'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れるだけで解消されると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by inserting it, the interference is eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかった、これでコンピューターを使った情報ネットワークが回復する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good, with this the information network using computers will be restored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに私のライフワークのランスのチェックも、えーと、今　ランス様はどこかな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, my life's work, Lance's check... hmm, where is Lord Lance now...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワシントン花畑か・・あそこに居るセンサームシは・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Washington flower field, huh... The sensor bug over there is... I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場の前に付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving in front of the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 留守ですと書かれているが、侵入者は容赦無く排除すると脅し文句も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A note says they're away, but also threatens that intruders will be mercilessly eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回は警報が外れていたが今回は違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time the alarm was disarmed, but this time it's different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, they enter.
